data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Honiara.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Honiara, Solomon Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Honiara.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Honiara do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 64,600 people living in Honiara, Solomon Islands. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 41,703 people in the state of Honiara who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Honiara, Solomon Islands.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Honiara, Solomon Islands has a population of 64,600.

We estimate Honiara has 20,152 people who might know Jesus, 41,703 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,744 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Honiara, Solomon Islands know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
